alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; De Kalb; DuPage; Kane; Kendall; La Salle; Lee; Northern Cook; Northern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 12:29AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Kendall, northern La Salle, southeastern Lee, northwestern Will, southern De Kalb, Kane, DuPage and northern Cook Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1228 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Barrington to near Elburn to near Mendota. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Aurora, Joliet, Naperville, Elgin, Cicero, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Bolingbrook, Palatine, Skokie, Des Plaines, Berwyn, Mount Prospect, Wheaton, Hoffman Estates, Oak Park, Downers Grove and Glenview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Illinois.

area.areaDesc: Central Cook; De Kalb; DuPage; Kane; Kendall; La Salle; Lee; Northern Cook; Northern Will
